projects.title: KayBee-Store
projects.description: I built an Ecommerce website using MERN stack (Mongo DB, Express JS, React, Node).This project included developing a user-friendly interface for a shopping website similar to Amazon, implementing a backend to store and retrieve products, and utilizing Context Hooks for efficient state management and to enhance user experience. The server is hosted using Railway App (I am using a free hosting plan valid for 500 hours.Please connect with me incase you dont see data on the screen.)

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: I recently created a Weather Application that helps you check the temperature of almost all cities in the world.

projects.title: Cake App
projects.description: As a developer, I created a dynamic and user-friendly cake ordering application using React, Java, Redux, and MongoDB. This project involved building an interactive front-end for selecting and customizing cakes, a robust backend to handle orders and user authentication, and efficient state management to ensure seamless user experience.

education.title: IT Business Analysis
education.description: I gained expertise in bridging the gap between business needs and technology solutions, learning to analyze requirements, model business processes, and implement IT strategies effectively. My studies equipped me with the skills to optimize business performance through the strategic use of technology.

education.title: IT Project Management
education.description: I mastered the art of planning, executing, and overseeing IT projects, ensuring they meet scope, time, and budget constraints. My studies focused on developing leadership, risk management, and communication skills essential for successful project delivery.

education.title: Computer Engineering
education.description: Delved into the design and development of computer systems, blending principles of electrical engineering and computer science. My studies equipped you with the skills to innovate and optimize hardware and software solutions.
